body_html: @fmassa I think it makes sense, because it won't be covered by the automatic broadcasting, and will allow for doing that in an efficient way. Broadcast can only unsqueeze additional dimensions at the front of the tensor, while in this case you actually want to unsqueeze one at the front and N-2 at the back.
body_text: @fmassa I think it makes sense, because it won't be covered by the automatic broadcasting, and will allow for doing that in an efficient way. Broadcast can only unsqueeze additional dimensions at the front of the tensor, while in this case you actually want to unsqueeze one at the front and N-2 at the back.
body: @fmassa I think it makes sense, because it won't be covered by the automatic broadcasting, and will allow for doing that in an efficient way. Broadcast can only unsqueeze additional dimensions at the front of the tensor, while in this case you actually want to unsqueeze one at the front and N-2 at the back.
